concept.title: 247.206 PREPARATION OF SOLICITATIONS AND CONTRACTS.

conbody.p: Consistent with FAR 15.304 and 215.304, consider using the following as evaluation factors or subfactors:
(1) Record of claims involving loss or damage; and
(2) Commitment of transportation assets to readiness support (e.g., Civil Reserve Air Fleet and Voluntary Intermodal Sealift Agreement).
